mention.text: Ukrainian military forcing Russian reporter to kneel caught on camera A photo taken by a Western journalist
a reporter for Russian news outlet LifeNews
a checkpoint between the Kharkov and Donetsk regions
This latest incident in a series of violations of journalists
the armed people at the site
a journalist for the New York-based Vice News
